startDateField.title: Start date field name
startDateField.description: Name of the field denoting when a ticket is planned to start.

dueDateField.title: Due Date field name
dueDateField.description: Name of the Due Date field.

extraCustomFields.title: Extra custom field names given as a comma-separated list
extraCustomFields.description: Additional custom field names to read and show for tickets.

upstreamRelations.title: Upstream relations given as a comma-separated list of direction:type items
upstreamRelations.description: An upstream ticket is a ticket that is needed for the current ticket. Each relation is specified as direction:type. Using this notation the depends on relation is inward:depend and the parent for is outward:subtask.

downstreamRelations.title: Downstream relations given as a comma-separated list of direction:type items
downstreamRelations.description: A downstream ticket is a ticket that is needs the current ticket. Each relation is specified as direction:type. Using this notation the is required for relation is outward:depend and the subtask of is inward:subtask.

autoLoadDeps.title: Automatically load issue dependencies
autoLoadDeps.description: Load issue dependencies automatically without explicit user request.

useHierarchicalLayout.title: Use hierarchical tree layout
useHierarchicalLayout.description: Use the hierarcical tree layout by default.

maxRecursionDepth.title: Maximum recursion depth
maxRecursionDepth.description: The maximum graph depth to recurse when following ticket relations.
